item.description:
Lets meet at the Boarding House Park as the 25th annual Lowell Folk Festival kick-off parade and music begins;  http://www.lowellfolkfestival.org/index.html

Enjoy a Full schedule of music, fun, and ethnic foods at two performance stages: Dutton Street Dance Pavilion and Boarding House Park:

6:40-7:00  Parade

7:00   Festival Kick-Off

7:15   Quebe Sisters Band

7:15   Bill Kirchen & Too Much Fun {at Dutton St. Dance Pavilion}

8:15   Dervish

9:00   La Excelencia                      {at Dutton St. Dance Pavilion}

9:15   Shemekia Copeland

* The performances and activities within the Festival are FREE. Food, beverage, and merchandise sales are available throughout the Festival.

** Parking is available at City of Lowell garages for $15/car.

*** The Festival carries on, whatever the July weather brings, RAIN OR SHINE!

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Friday night at Lowell Folk Festival
